title: Introduction to Nav2
content: Nav2, the Navigation Stack for ROS 2, provides tools and libraries to enable autonomous navigation in robots.

title: Installing Nav2
content: The Nav2 stack can be installed on Ubuntu systems using ROS 2 package repositories. Ensure that dependencies like AMCL and Map Server are also installed.

title: Configuring Nav2 Parameters
content: Nav2 supports extensive configuration through YAML files, including costmaps, planners, and controller settings.

title: Understanding Nav2 Plugins
content: Nav2 plugins allow developers to extend the functionality of costmaps, planners, and other modules.

title: Nav2 Behavior Trees
content: Behavior Trees in Nav2 define the decision-making logic for robot navigation, including obstacle avoidance and goal-reaching strategies.

title: Path Planning in Nav2
content: Nav2 provides path planning algorithms like Dijkstra and A*, enabling robots to find optimal paths in complex environments.

title: Nav2 Localization
content: Nav2 uses AMCL for localization, allowing robots to determine their position relative to a pre-mapped environment.

title: Obstacle Avoidance with Nav2
content: Nav2's DWB controller supports dynamic obstacle avoidance, ensuring safe navigation in changing environments.

title: Nav2 Testing and Simulation
content: Nav2 integrates with Gazebo for simulation, enabling developers to test navigation strategies in virtual environments.

title: Advanced Nav2 Topics: Multi-Robot Navigation
content: Nav2 supports multi-robot navigation, enabling collaborative mapping, planning, and control in shared spaces.

title: Nav2 Waypoint Follower
content: Learn how to use Nav2's waypoint follower to move a robot through pre-defined waypoints.

title: Tuning Local Planner in Nav2
content: Optimize the local planner settings to ensure smooth robot movement in dynamic environments.

title: Nav2 with Multi-Robot Systems
content: Explore techniques for managing navigation tasks in multi-robot systems using Nav2.

title: Behavior Tree in Nav2
content: Understand how Nav2 utilizes behavior trees to manage complex navigation tasks.

title: Nav2 with Dynamic Obstacles
content: Configure Nav2 to navigate effectively in environments with dynamic obstacles.

title: Nav2 Recovery Behaviors
content: Implement recovery behaviors like clearing obstacles or reinitializing localization in Nav2.

title: Nav2 Planner Configuration
content: Customize the global planner's parameters to optimize path planning.

title: Simulating Navigation in Gazebo with Nav2
content: Simulate robot navigation tasks in Gazebo using the Nav2 stack.

title: Costmap Layer Plugins in Nav2
content: Extend the functionality of costmaps using custom layer plugins in Nav2.

title: Understanding Nav2 Lifecycle Nodes
content: Learn about lifecycle nodes in Nav2 for robust state management.

title: Nav2 with Real Robots
content: Set up and configure Nav2 on physical robots for real-world applications.

title: Goal Tolerance in Nav2
content: Set up goal tolerances to determine when a robot has successfully reached its destination.

title: Nav2 with ROSbag
content: Record and play back navigation scenarios using ROSbag for testing.

title: Nav2 Rviz2 Visualization
content: Visualize navigation tasks in Rviz2 with Nav2 integration.

title: Safe Navigation with Nav2
content: Ensure safe navigation with collision avoidance and costmap configuration.

title: Nav2 Path Optimization
content: Optimize robot paths by adjusting parameters in the global and local planners.

title: Nav2 and Localization
content: Use AMCL and other localization methods to ensure accurate robot positioning in Nav2.

title: Customizing Nav2 Plugins
content: Develop and integrate custom plugins to extend Nav2's functionality.

title: Nav2 Parameter Tuning Guide
content: Find the optimal parameter settings for Nav2 components in various environments.

title: Nav2 Simulation with TurtleBot
content: Simulate navigation tasks with Nav2 using a TurtleBot in Gazebo.
